name: PENGUIN-CHIEVER
description:
PENGUIN-CHIEVER

We are Savvy, a team of 4 people who want to explore new ways of doing Open Education. We get together every week for a 8-hours jam to experiment on the new opportunities in educational resources and collective intelligence.

This time was special.

We wanted to work on the theme OPEN RECOGNITION, as well as this week's WEEKLY GAME JAM theme "OH,NO!", so we made a game with a lot of achievements, and many ways to lose. Open Recognition explores the new ways to validate, attest our skills and achievements to be complementary to diplomas and such.

In this game, you'll have the opportunity to be greatly rewarded for your actions, but be careful, the thirst of recognition can be deadly.

We made this game in one "8 hours Jam". We hope you enjoy it!

Made by Delphin Casado, Lola El Koubi, Tom Rivière, Frédéric Urien and special guest Adela Barbulescu. Thanks a lot Ghislain Mirat for creating the sound design in 20 minutes.
